questions.sentence:
Complete the program where Surveyor communicates with Mars orbiters (Maven + Tianwen-1). The Surveyor should read a file held by these orbiters containing the status  information. The program should read the file, process the data, and then display the status. 
	  FILE *file
	  char line[256]
	  char SurveyorName[50]
	  char datetime
	
	  [      ] = OPEN(mars_orbiter_message.txt,r)
	
	  if (file == NULL) {
	  error(Error opening file)
	  return EXIT_FAILURE
 }
	 while
	 (GETS(line, sizeof(line), file)) {
	 [       ](line)

	 WRITE(file,datetime,[        ],SurveyorName)
}
	 CLOSE(file)
